entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
